productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -6, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -5, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -5, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -4, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -4, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -3, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -3, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -2, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -2, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -1, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -1, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -0, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT h.po_no) AS open_pos_dminus6 FROM po_hdr AS h JOIN po_line AS l ON l.po_no = h.po_no WHERE h.order_date >= CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -0, GETDATE())) AND h.order_date <  CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, 1, GETDATE())) AND (COALESCE(l.qty_ordered,0) - COALESCE(l.qty_received,0)) > 0;
